website_summaries.verdict: A quality space-saving alternative to a traditional spice rack.
pros: The metal rack stands similarly to a picture frame, and takes up half the space of a normal spice rack
To save even more space the metal rack can be attached to a wall or cupboard, or simply stick the jars directly onto the fridge
The lids turn smoothly and stay tightly sealed, keeping everything fresh
The wide, clear tops make it easy to see when you're running low on something
cons: Better suited for lightweight spices and herbs, or loose leaf tea
A full tin of sea salt will slide down a little

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I have been needing new spice containers and a new way to store them and when I came across this I was so excited! I seen several different varieties and read several different reviews and decided to give this one a try and I AM SO GLAD I DID!!! It is so easy to use!! It takes up such a small space and they hold more than what you would think! I used my cricut machine to make labels so I wouldn’t forget what was in them. I have it stored in my cabinet with extra spices hid behind it. I will be ordering more for myself and as gifts!! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Reid

customer_reviews.title: Love! Will order again!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this spice rack!! I use it for my loose teas and Label them with a dry erase marker. I can easily put a teaspoon in it and does not make a big mess. The containers fit about 2oz. Depends how big the pieces of the spice or tea are. The containers stay on the backing well and I do not have an issue with anything falling off. I would suggest this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Richardson

customer_reviews.title: they do look good, and while I wish they worked a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be functional and it leans more towards decorative. The tops can be tough to slide between shaker, pour, and closed. The magnets need to be stronger. When full they tend to slide on the metal board, and just putting them on the fridge is probably a non-starter. That being said, they do look good, and while I wish they worked a bit better, I am still using them for their intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse I. Weidaw

customer_reviews.title: I was trying to find something to fill the void in our kitchen and I really like it!
customer_reviews.text: It looks very stylish and holds a lot of spices. I put the ones I use most often and it saves me from having to sort through the cabinet while cooking (I should organize it a bit better). It keeps the spices up and out of the way as well so they don't get dirty or lost.
customer_reviews.author: JCTexas

customer_reviews.title: Great spice jars
customer_reviews.text: Great spice jars! The lids stay on good and are a bit tight. The clear part is a hard plastic but is firmly attached. I think the plastic helps keep them from being too heavy. Magnets are pretty strong. I filled mine all the way up because I wanted to see the spice. Mine stay in place on the side of my fridge. They are easy to access to use while cooking. The jar has a bright polished look, about the same as my Samsung fridge door.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Weak magnets
customer_reviews.text: The design was aesthetically pleasing but magnets are so weak that once spices are added the jars slide right off. I was really excited to get this for our camper and was super disappointed when I was unable to use it. We tried adding Velcro to no avail, then we put additional magnets on the backside and that helped a little, so I think getting some stronger ones might do the trick. Even the hubs was bummed (usually he doesn’t give a hoot about this kind of stuff) Hopefully I’ll be able to modify it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: More than spice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put my child's rock collection in to keep them from being all over the house. Planning on buying more, he has a lot of rocks.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stodden

customer_reviews.title: Efficient storage
customer_reviews.text: The Intergalactic Spice Rack Set with Magnetic Jars is being used at my five year old granddaughters craft table. It’s easy to use and the items which the jars house are visible through the lids. Tidying up after a project is much quicker now as all the little widgets and whatnots have a home. It is a perfect addition to the craft table.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Koitzsch

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for small items
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to store and organize my daughters hair clips ties and small bows. We both love them and they're easy enough for her to open without scattering them all over
customer_reviews.author: shey

customer_reviews.title: OMG! Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the tins are excellent. The spice rack is the perfect size and comes with an easel back or the hardware to screw it to a stationary surface. The customer service for this product is exceptional. If you're looking for an organizational tool, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: CRR 12

customer_reviews.title: Spice rack
customer_reviews.text: Placed rack in our new camp trailer, works great, holds more than enough spices and stores on metal surfaces or on the included base. Magnets could be a little stronger but that’s a personal preference. Good product, good company.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Real budget, adjust your expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this strictly to store tea leaves. Works for the purpose. The steel plate arrived with scratches which was unsightly but it would have still worked fine to stick the tins(not too strongly however) . The plate to wide for my narrow kitchen cabinet door though. I suspected as much but I mainly needed the tins. The tins and plate together was still cheaper from this seller than other options out there. I've stuck the tins instead to my stove top hood :)
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna T

customer_reviews.title: I like this product a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. I think it could be improved in a few small ways. I think you could use a slightly more powerful magnet on the bottom. I put mine on the side of my fridge, which is right next to my stove. They ones with heavier spices, like salt, slide a bit and I worry they won't hold. They do, so far, but I would like a stronger magnet. Also, It would be nice if you included some labels of the common spices. Both these improvements might add a little to your bottom line, but I thought the price in general was more than reasonable and you could easily charge more if you needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen M. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Organized Clutter
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the stand becomes the hanging anchor. No worries about the base falling off the wall! The twist tops have spice shaker or pour holes pre-cut as well, making this the ultimate mini-kitchen or camper spice rack!
customer_reviews.author: C Stolpe

customer_reviews.title: I love these containers
customer_reviews.text: The containers are a nice quality with magnetic backs that work great in our rv. They are easy to get to and we mounted them to the wall in 2 Minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Minter

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It’s super efficient, convenient and looks good too. The only downside is that the spout to sprinkle spice is not the easiest so I just take the lid off and scoop out what I need. Overall it’s great and I’m going to order more since I have more spices.
customer_reviews.author: desirae groves

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I don’t have a lot of space for all my spices, so this works great!W
customer_reviews.author: Jane G

customer_reviews.title: Space saving and nicely made
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Mounted in our fifth wheel, but used VBM tape for mounting. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Register

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of these, but I ended up returning them because the manufacturing quality was poor. The holes were not properly deburred, causing interference as you rotated the top. The fit between the top and bottom was also variable: some fit loose, some fit too tight. One of the jars had a sharp burr sticking out that actually cut my finger.
customer_reviews.author: djsh4dowfan

customer_reviews.title: These are great, but make sure to wash them before!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this amazing spice rack set, I was able to save A LOT of space. I love how it looks and feels too! Definitely one of the better quality ones out there. The only reason why I am rating it a 4-star is because of how dirty the inside was. At first glance, it doesn't seem dirty at all, but after washing them with a damp cloth, boy was I glad to have washed them. Most of the containers had some sort of black residue on them.
customer_reviews.author: Baconking

customer_reviews.title: These are great for holding spiced in our travel trailer
customer_reviews.text: These are great for holding spiced in our travel trailer. The magnetic backs are strong enough to hold on to the stove hood...even during travel.
customer_reviews.author: OffBeatLeaf

customer_reviews.title: Loose fitting lids
customer_reviews.text: I like the option to have the spice rack free standing or wall mounted. Each container has two openings that can be opened by twisting the lid. One for a heavier pour or one to allow a sprinkling of the contents. The only drawback is the fitting of the lids. They don't fit very tight and come off if you're not careful. The magnets are very strong on the other hand and will stay in place. I will be using this in my RV, so that is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I use these canisters in my online ESL classroom. They work great and coordinate with each lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Sajeeda

customer_reviews.title: Strong Magnets, board stands up on own
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hang up on the wall but I instead have it sitting on my counter. It includes a stand so the board can stand up on its own. Very convenient. You do have to be careful that the sifters are lined up correctly to not spill stuff on the floor. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these jars. I bought them a few months ago and use them all the time.You can fit almost an entire jar of seasoning or spices in one of these so it holds quite a bit. I have a pretty small kitchen so being smart about how I store things is a must. My fridge sits beside my stove so I just stick the jars to the fridge so that they are right there for me to easily access as I cook. This would be a great housewarming gift or a gift for a college student with a small apartment if they like to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ease to fill and label.
customer_reviews.text: Love that now all of my spices are on the fridge and out of the way
customer_reviews.author: Skullx1963

customer_reviews.title: Good for the $
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had a chance to install it yet but appears to be exactly how it was described.
customer_reviews.author: My55F100

customer_reviews.title: I like the spice rack set!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and the spice boxes cling to the board very well. It saves much space than traditional spice bottles and the design is neat!
customer_reviews.author: Loveway

customer_reviews.title: Many Magnets Don't Work. Would Not Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This looked like a great way to organize the kitchen! However when I received them, the tins were mostly all slightly warped. That doesn't bother me as much as the magnets do. I had 5 of the 18 I bought not have a good magnet on it. Didn't hold to the fridge or the board shipped with the containers. Considering the magnets are the main functionality of the product to be able to work, I have to give this a very poor review. Seriously disappointed. Thought this was gonna be great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: [EDIT] GOOD customer service |. Good but arrived damaged :(
customer_reviews.text: [EDIT] The customer service was incredible and sent me a new piece that is perfect!! My mom and sister in law saw and loved it and I am going to be buying for them as a gift. ——————————————————- Overall good, but It got to my home full of scratches and some bumps. It was a bummer because I was really hoping for a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Letícia

customer_reviews.title: Small but nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice way to keep spices. The display is cure. I paired them with round chalkboard labels To make it easy to label them. Unfortunately, they aren’t as big as I hoped for and didn’t store a full jar of spice, so as a way to cut down on pantry space they’re less than perfect. I use a set for my coffee station as well. Each tin stores about 1 pots worth of beans and a lot of loose tea.
customer_reviews.author: Jaded Aria

customer_reviews.title: Awesome size and holds a great amount of spices
customer_reviews.text: Awesome size and holds a great amount of spices. Purchased for a small RV. Hangs on the wall. Let be it!
customer_reviews.author: D.Sibley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved set so much I bought another as a wedding gift
customer_reviews.author: katherine weiss

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended it
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the product and it has a good look add a good look to your kitchen. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I live on a boat and so space is at an absolute premium and intentional organization is imperative. Installation is a breeze. Each container is generously sized. And the price is very reasonable. All in all, very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these things! I stick them on my fridge to save space.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this product. The magnets are worthless, hardly hold when empty let alone when something is added to the jars. Would have sent them back but it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase! The price is fair, the magnets are strong, and the design is simple! I like that they come with brackets to hang them but they also have a stand that kicks out to set them upright, I could see keeping desk supplies organized this way. I'm happy to have my spices off the counter and hanging on the wall! I will consider purchasing another for my desk at work!
customer_reviews.author: Anna G.

customer_reviews.title: Some tins were not magnetic.
customer_reviews.text: I love the little tins, but 3 of them are not magnetic. The base plate has a stand but came with screws to mount it on the wall , which is why I bought this, but no screw holes. ..
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Christenson

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I wanted them to be. They shipped fast. Its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Jett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff to turn lids to dispense otherwise they are great. Space saving and aesthetically clean and tasteful.
customer_reviews.author: shayne

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Does not keep the spices air tight , so they often clump together
customer_reviews.author: Adawn lmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This worked out great! It looks nice and is easy to install ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked out great! It looks nice and is easy to install on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Magnets not strong enough.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this didn't work well. The magnets were not strong enough to hold anything inside the containers.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fill any salt based seasoning to the top.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. My spice cabinet has been cleaned up considerably! There was not anything I particularly disliked about them. However, there was a definite learning curve. At first I filled them all full and anything with the word “salt” in it slid right off the board because the salt was so heavy. Once I corrected that issue, they worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Newby

customer_reviews.title: Missing spice container
customer_reviews.text: This is so great! It keeps my spices out of the way. No more spices falling through the wire shelves in my pantry or sitting next to my pots and pans in the cabinets. I hung mine up on the wall and it was super easy. The only upsetting thing is that I am missing one spice container in the packaging. Kinda frustrating, but I still like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Decluttering
customer_reviews.text: Each jar holds around a 1/4 ounce of my flowers. Air tight and the magnets hold tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: but love the twist feature to sprinkle and pour without taking ...
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than the IKEA version.. look the same in the photos and was going to add with my current IKEA holders.. but love the twist feature to sprinkle and pour without taking cap off
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Herman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, anyone visiting my kitchen never fail to notice nor walkout without a positive comment. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I used this in my camper to organize spices, ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my camper to organize spices, however be aware some of the lids did not fit snuggly on the jars which is a problem for a standing spice rack. I am waiting to see if seller will send 2 new jars with lids that fir.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Barely magnetic, can’t hold a full tin of peppercorns!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to buy this set for the magnetic tins and not the stand, but the tins themselves were barely magnetic at all! I couldn’t even stick one half filled tin to my fridge! I’m very disappointed as I had hoped to save some cabinet space in my small apartment. I bought adhesive magnets separately, hopefully they will help the tins stay on my fridge...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it look great in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: A very practical and usefull product, i just love how it look in my kitchen, i recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Wimpy magnets
customer_reviews.text: The magnets on the tins are not as strong as I’d like. Not bad but the tins do slide. I will definitely buy more tins but the mounting tray is not very good. I am using mine in a drawer and it works there.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Saving space
customer_reviews.text: I love my magnetic spice rack because it frees up space on my counter and now I have more room.
customer_reviews.author: lesliephillips

customer_reviews.title: NO STARS
customer_reviews.text: No stars! Out of the nine tins 7 were damaged, also the plate that they were suppose to stick to! The magnets are not very strong. But a bent tin can’t stick anyway. I seem to be getting more and more damaged things from amazon, I’ve started to shop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sytlish rack not only for spices
customer_reviews.text: I organized a sewing cabinet out of an old computer desk. The spice rack was perfect for small item storage. We actually used a double sided tape to secure the rack on the wall of the cabinet. Very useful and looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality at all
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality at all. My biggest issue is that the magnetics are very cheap and not strong at all. If you fill the container with spices, the spice jar slides down....whether you put in on the fridge, or use the wall mount. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Effie

customer_reviews.title: Lids don't fit snug enough
customer_reviews.text: It is an attractive set, but some of the lids are not very snug. I want to use these in my rv, but I'm afraid the lids will fall off as we are going down the road. They would be fine for home use.
customer_reviews.author: C Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it but......
customer_reviews.text: Love this item sleek look today takes up very little space butttt....i wish the magnets were stronger. They hold "ok" while empty but not so good when full of spices.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Soares

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The magnets are weak, in my particular case it cannot hold jars on the fridge
customer_reviews.author: Joe Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids' hair accessories
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my kids' hair accessories. It keeps everything so organized. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Magnets too weak
customer_reviews.text: The magnets are too weak to hold anything. Whether propped up or hanging. This product is useless.
customer_reviews.author: C P.

customer_reviews.title: Weak magnet. Loose lids.
customer_reviews.text: Weak magnet. Loose lids. 2 stars for good looks and semi-functional.
customer_reviews.author: phatnlaoz

customer_reviews.title: Planning on getting another set- these are great!
customer_reviews.text: Loving these and ordered 4 sets- 3 for my impressive spice collection and 1 for my daughters hair tie drawer! Planning on getting another set- these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Great to have the sheet to attach the magnet spice ...
customer_reviews.text: Great to have the sheet to attach the magnet spice holders. I didn't realize they can only replace spices from small jars.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Need stronger magnets
customer_reviews.text: It looked just as described, but the magnets were very weak and if you are putting anything with a little bit of weight in it they won't hold. I was using them in my craft room and One wouldn't even stick to my magnet frame. I had to add extra magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds all of our favorite spices.
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Easy to use and store all our favorite spices.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O Maher

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I use command hooks and placed it on the inside upper cabinet. Easy to use and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Abbott

customer_reviews.title: I love this spice rack
customer_reviews.text: I love this spice rack, it keeps all my spices organized and the sifter/holes on the side makes it easy to sprinkle seasonings. Also it feels like high quality and will last a long time (heavy and well made).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not great
customer_reviews.text: The magnets already feel off off of a few. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bosley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice Rack fast shipping very good seller highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: SNE

customer_reviews.title: Magnets suck
customer_reviews.text: This products needs stronger magnets. The spices cannot be held up and they slide
customer_reviews.author: Adam E.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 2 so far and love them. 5 stars..
customer_reviews.author: Chad Williams

customer_reviews.title: Really like the look/functionality so far!
customer_reviews.text: We got these and mounted them on the inside of our pantry door (see picture). They're very attractive and suit our needs well, just a couple things to keep in mind. 1. Don't fill the little canisters past the fill line on the inside...you risk having spices spill out if you do. 2. Be mindful of the holes on the sides of the canisters...make sure they are fully closed/blocked off before putting them back. Aside from the two points above (which I learned the hard way), these are wonderful and we'll probably end up getting a third set! Note that we ordered the labels you see in the picture separately.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Spice Storage
customer_reviews.text: This spice storage solution is one of the best yet. We have 3 sets of these on the refrigerator to hold all of our spices. I like them much better than the spice tins as I can see all the spices readily. One thing, if the tins are overloaded then they might slide a bit, I solved this by adding thin round N52 Neodymium magnets available here on Amazon. Now they hang on tightly.
customer_reviews.author: GRP Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Organization, lid system sucks
customer_reviews.text: Bought for RV kitchen, wish it can with ingredient tag. Containers look cool but using them is the pits. Doesn't seal well and seasonings end up sticking to container exterior. I have to wipe down during each use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent overall!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this compact little set. My one complaint is that the magnets are too weak to hold denser spices like fine sea salt and when the containers are full, the magnets are barely hanging on. I'm still happy with the purchase though and hope that the company will consider adding stronger magnets to the set.
customer_reviews.author: Aetoole

customer_reviews.title: Great Find
customer_reviews.text: These Intergalactic Spice Rack Set With Magnetic Jars are wonderful. I actually don't use them as spice jars but to organize paper clips, magnetic tacks, elastics, etc on my magnetic bulletin board. I found them nicer than what I found in the office supply sections. High quality, I may use some of them for spices.
customer_reviews.author: TonyP

customer_reviews.title: Great for often used spices!
customer_reviews.text: My cabinet is filled with so many spices, vinegars, oils etc. that I'm constantly rummaging around for the spices that I use in almost every dish I make. This makes it so much easier and faster! These are very well made and have never fallen off when opening and closing the cabinet door.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Magnets aren't strong enough
customer_reviews.text: Love the design. Each container has 2 openings, one for a "shaker" and one for a "pouring". The pouring works well for minced onion and things like that. The lids stay closed well, even while moving around in our camper. BUT......they fall off the plate with minimal movement because the magnets....well....suck. So if you want this for a kitchen counter and are just setting it there (it has a picture frame style stand) then you are fine. But if you want this mounted on a wall or God forbid in your RV....don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Purplelily222

customer_reviews.title: Magnets Not Very Strong
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use/attach to our camper cabinet. Once I took it out of the box, I knew the magnets weren't going to be strong enough. I was going to repurpose it in the kitchen or garage to hold things, but I didn't think they sealed well enough to hold spices or would be strong enough to hold screws or small items. I sent it back and would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Classroom Dice Shakers
customer_reviews.text: I am a special ed teacher. I bought these to use as dice shakers, so the dice doesn’t go flying when kids roll them. I was SO HAPPY to find these because they stick to my magnetic whiteboard! The only thing I’m planning to alter is to line the inside with felt so they stay quiet when dice is rolled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to declutter my kitchen counter tops and this spice rack is great. I mounted it on the inside of a cabinet door. It's out of the way, but easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: KathyFick

customer_reviews.title: I love neat!
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice! I really do like it. I wanted to just hang it on my wall without making holes so used command strips which holds it perfectly. I love the convenience of having spices and herbs vvliise at hand and it makes a really nice clutter-free presentation on the wall. Arrived on time in perfect condition. Would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Pelton

customer_reviews.title: Great space saving solution!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect solution to de-clutter my kitchen. I mounted mine on the wall so that it would free up counter space and has been a perfect solution for me. I would advise when you take them off of the plate to grab the entire container rather than just the lid as it does not lock into place.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Meyer

customer_reviews.title: These are a great space saver in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I love these for my spices. I bought 2 sets and keep all my spices neatly organized and right by my stove (hung on the wall.) They look really good and stay put. I used a label maker to mark the spices—it doesn't come with labels.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Holds alot and mounted easily on the inside out my cabinet door. The lid turns so you can sprinkle your spice without taking the lid off.
customer_reviews.author: GerriC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for decluttering!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a couple weeks ago and they are amazing. They are perfect for decluttering your spices! I ordered two originally but only received one mounting bracket instead of two. After contacting the company they were more than willing to resolve the issue. Great product, great customer service. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: sydney

customer_reviews.title: Unusual application for this item!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to store guitar picks. I was concerned that this product might not be able to handle the weight of a full cannister of picks, but it works perfectly! And I, who am as non-handy as they come, easily installed this on the side of a bookcase in my studio. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: David Ladner

customer_reviews.title: loose lids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the rv however the lids don't fit snug enough to actually work. A few fell off while traveling. I don't expect them to be so tight you can't get them off but if you're mounting something other than flat you'd expect a snug fit
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a friends birthday and she absolutely loves it. It was almost immediately after she got home she sent me a pic with all the jars filled with her spices. Great product and great communication from the company
customer_reviews.author: cmteale

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these little guys! They make my kitchen organization so easy and all of my spices are right there on the side of the fridge for me to grab as I cook. So convenient!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend for spices
customer_reviews.text: love the look of this and it fit inside my camper cabinet door perfectly but... It is not airtight and spices will clump due to humidity and you have to be very gentle closing and opening the door or they will fall off. They might be good for some crafts but not going to work for me.
customer_reviews.author: DebraJ

customer_reviews.title: Where have these been all my life!
customer_reviews.text: Love these tins! I have so many spices i make a mess trying to get to them. I got these and freed up alot of time that was spent looking for spices. And I'm about to order more. I recommend these highly
customer_reviews.author: roe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We now have 2 one for my husbands outdoor kitchen (squirrel proof) and this one is for our small camper. They hold a lot and have small and large holes for dispensing.
customer_reviews.author: smrmarjorie

customer_reviews.title: They loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for someone who does not have a lot of cabinet and counter space. They loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Bwill

customer_reviews.title: very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I originally ordered a while back and recently just bought 2 more sets. The only reason its not a 5 star is ALOT of the lids are really loose and i am kind of scared to put spices in them. So they might go back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Camper
customer_reviews.text: Item just as described. Saves space in camper for spices and other little things.
customer_reviews.author: Whoa Babe

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The tins stay closed very well and the magnet strength is as needed. I'm sure they could hold more weight than the herbs I keep in them. Also visually appealing. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Alea Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Possibly not for long term use..
customer_reviews.text: The lid is not very tight. I bought this to keep my Indian spices. The lid being loose spilled all over the space.. not a good product for long term in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: RamSwap

product_meta.title: Intergalactic Spice Rack Set With Magnetic Jars, Stand and Wall Mount by Uncluttered Designs (9 Tin)
feature_bullets: 9 TIN SPICE RACK SET: Comes with 9 tins with magnetic backing, spice stand and wall anchoring system.
CLUTTER FREE COUNTERS: Spice rack inclines at a steep 70 degree angle to take up less counter space
MAGNETICALLY ATTACH TO YOUR FRIDGE or WALL: Or forego the spice rack and adorn your fridge with spices! Or use our wall mount to put the rack anywhere.
MULTIPLE USES: Great not just for spices but also beads, pins, buttons, hardware, candies, hair clips and more!
NO HASSLE GUARANTEE: We back our product with a no risk guarantee. Buy from authorized reseller Gift Studios and if you are unsatisfied in any way, we will gladly refund your money.
